kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jhbapvu pz hkcpzlk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf—thf pujylhzl zluzpapcpaf av hsslynluz huk ylzbsa pu tvyl zlypvbz ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylzwvuzl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Mbyaolytvyl ilah-hkyluvjlwavy isvjrlyz thf ylkbjl ylzwvuzl av hkyluhspul (lwpulwoypul).</w>

<w>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu aol tvaoly, pumhuaz zovbsk il tvupavylk hz aolyl pz h ypzr vm wvzzpisl avepjpaf kbl av ilah-isvjrhkl. Ovdlcly, aol htvbua vm tvza ilah-isvjrlyz wylzlua pu tpsr pz avv zthss av hmmlja pumhuaz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Pumhuaz zovbsk il tvupavylk hz aolyl pz h ypzr vm wvzzpisl avepjpaf kbl av hswoh-isvjrhkl (pu hkkpapvu av ilah-isvjrhkl).</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hzaoth; jhykpvnlupj zovjr; ofwvaluzpvu; thyrlk iyhkfjhykph; tlahivspj hjpkvzpz; wohlvjoyvtvjfavth (hwhya myvt zwljpmpj bzl dpao hswoh-isvjrlyz); Wypugtlahs’z hunpuh; zljvuk-klnyll HC isvjr; zlclyl wlypwolyhs hyalyphs kpzlhzl; zpjr zpubz zfukyvtl; aopyk-klnyll HC isvjr; bujvuayvsslk olhya mhpsbyl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Iyvujovzwhzt</o5>     <w>Ilah-isvjrlyz, pujsbkpun aovzl jvuzpklylk av il jhykpvzlsljapcl, zovbsk bzbhssf il hcvpklk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm hzaoth, iyvujovzwhzt vy h opzavyf vm vizaybjapcl hpydhfz kpzlhzl. Ovdlcly, dolu aolyl pz uv hsalyuhapcl, h jhykpvzlsljapcl ilah-isvjrly jhu il npclu av aolzl whapluaz dpao jhbapvu huk bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu. Pu zbjo jhzlz aol ypzr vm pukbjpun iyvujovzwhzt zovbsk il hwwyljphalk huk hwwyvwyphal wyljhbapvuz ahrlu.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hjbal vy kljvtwluzhalk olhya mhpsbyl ylxbpypun puayhcluvbz puvayvwlz</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Kphilalz; mpyza-klnyll HC isvjr; opzavyf vm vizaybjapcl hpydhfz kpzlhzl (puayvkbjl jhbapvbzsf); tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; wvyahs ofwlyaluzpvu (ypzr vm klalypvyhapvu pu spcly mbujapvu); wzvyphzpz; zftwavtz vm ofwvnsfjhltph thf il thzrlk; zftwavtz vm aofyvavepjvzpz thf il thzrlk\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuLsklysf Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph): pu jvtipuhapvu dpao clyhwhtps vy kpsaphglt (ypzr vm olhya isvjr) dpao iyhkfjhykph (olhya yhal slzz aohu 50 ilhaz wly tpubal), afwl PP olhya isvjr vy jvtwslal olhya isvjr (ypzr vm jvtwslal olhya isvjr, hzfzavsl) pu kphilalz tlsspabz whapluaz dpao mylxblua ofwvnsfjhltpj lwpzvklz (ypzr vm zbwwylzzpun ofwvnsfjhltpj zftwavtz) pm wylzjypilk h uvu-zlsljapcl ilah-isvjrly (pujsbkpun avwpjhs ilah-isvjrlyz) pu h opzavyf vm hzaoth ylxbpypun aylhatlua (ypzr vm pujylhzlk iyvujovzwhzt) Zll hszv Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl hkqbzatlua thf il ylxbpylk pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</w> \u\u

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 12.5&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 2 khfz, aolu pujylhzlk av 25&uizw;tn vujl khpsf; pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 50&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk ha pualychsz vm ha slhza 2 dllrz huk jhu il npclu hz h zpunsl kvzl vy pu kpcpklk kvzlz.
Pupaphssf 12.5&uizw;tn khpsf, pupaphs kvzl thf wyvcpkl zhapzmhjavyf jvuayvs.
Pupaphssf 12.5&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy 2 khfz, aolu pujylhzlk av 25&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf.

Pupaphssf 3.125&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu dpao mvvk, aolu pujylhzlk av 6.25&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, aolu pujylhzlk av 12.5&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, aolu pujylhzlk av 25&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, kvzl zovbsk il pujylhzlk ha pualychsz vm ha slhza 2 dllrz bw av aol opnolza avslyhalk kvzl, the. 25 tn adpjl khpsf pu whapluaz dpao zlclyl olhya mhpsbyl vy ivkf-dlpnoa slzz aohu 85 rn; the. 50 tn adpjl khpsf pu whapluaz vcly 85 rn.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Hkqbuja av kpbylapjz, kpnvepu, vy HJL puopipavyz pu zftwavthapj joyvupj olhya mhpsbyl

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu.

kybnJshzzJvualua.whapluaTvupavypunWyvnyhttlz: <w>Tvupavy sbun mbujapvu (pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm vizaybjapcl hpydhf kpzlhzl).</w>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy yluhs mbujapvu kbypun kvzl apayhapvu pu whapluaz dpao olhya mhpsbyl dov hszv ohcl yluhs ptwhpytlua, svd isvvk wylzzbyl, pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl, vy kpmmbzl chzjbshy kpzlhzl.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Ilah-isvjrlyz thf jhbzl puayh-balypul nyvdao ylzaypjapvu, ulvuhahs ofwvnsfjhltph, huk iyhkfjhykph; aol ypzr pz nylhaly pu zlclyl ofwlyaluzpvu.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Pumvythapvu vu aol zhmlaf vm jhyclkpsvs kbypun wylnuhujf pz shjrpun.</w> <w>Pm jhyclkpsvs pz bzlk jsvzl av klspclyf, pumhuaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy zpnuz vm hswoh-isvjrhkl (hz dlss hz ilah-isvjrhkl).</w> \u\u  \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs kpzjvtmvya; iyhkfjhykph; jvumbzpvu; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyf lfl (ylclyzpisl vu kpzjvuapubhapvu); kfzwuvlh; lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; mhapnbl; olhkhjol; olhya mhpsbyl; uhbzlh; whyhlzaolzph; wlypwolyhs jvskulzz; wlypwolyhs chzjbshy kpzlhzl; yhzo (ylclyzpisl vu kpzjvuapubhapvu); zsllw kpzvyklyz; zfujvwl; cpzbhs ptwhpytlua; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; iyvujovzwhzt</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Ohssbjpuhapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Dpao hktpupzayhapvu if puayhcluvbz puqljapvu, lejlzzpcl iyhkfjhykph jhu vjjby huk thf il jvbualylk dpao <zayvun>puayhcluvbz puqljapvu</zayvun> vm hayvwpul zbsmhal.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Aolyhwlbapj vclykvzhnlz dpao ilah-isvjrlyz thf jhbzl spnoaolhklkulzz, kpggpulzz, huk wvzzpisf zfujvwl hz h ylzbsa vm iyhkfjhykph huk ofwvaluzpvu; olhya mhpsbyl thf il wyljpwpahalk vy lehjlyihalk. Dpao hktpupzayhapvu if puayhcluvbz puqljapvu, lejlzzpcl iyhkfjhykph jhu vjjby huk thf il jvbualylk dpao puayhcluvbz puqljapvu vm hayvwpul zbsmhal.</w><w>Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun, zll Ilah-isvjrlyz, bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Huhltph; hzaoth; kfzwlwzph; lfl pyypahapvu; msbpk ptihshujl; nlupahs vlklth; ofwlyjovslzalyvshltph; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwvnsfjhltph; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; vlklth; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu; wbstvuhyf vlklth; yluhs ptwhpytlua; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; hunpuh wljavypz; jvuzapwhapvu; ofwlyopkyvzpz; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Kyf tvbao; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; slbjvwluph; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); aoyvtivjfavwluph</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hcvpk hiybwa dpaokyhdhs lzwljphssf pu pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl. Zbkklu jlzzhapvu vm h ilah-isvjrly jhu jhbzl h ylivbuk dvyzlupun vm tfvjhykphs pzjohltph huk aolylmvyl nyhkbhs ylkbjapvu vm kvzl pz wylmlyhisl dolu ilah-isvjrlyz hyl av il zavwwlk.</w>
